nodes.description: 1975年，他因一桩三重谋杀案被定罪，并已在巴黎监狱服无期徒刑。
nodes.support_text: Carlos, a Venezuelan whose real name is Ilich Ramirez Sanchez, is already serving life in a Paris prison for a triple murder in 1975.

nodes.description: 1982年3月，一列行驶于巴黎和图卢兹之间的火车发生爆炸，造成5人死亡。
nodes.support_text: The first bombing, in March 1982, was on a train between Paris and Toulouse, killing five people and wounding 28.

nodes.description: 1982年4月，巴黎一家反叙利亚报社外发生汽车爆炸案，造成1人死亡。
nodes.support_text: It was followed a month later by the car bombing of an anti-Syrian newspaper in Paris. One passer-by was killed and 60 injured.

nodes.description: 1983年新年前夜，一列行驶于马赛和巴黎之间的TGV列车发生爆炸，造成3人死亡。
nodes.support_text: The other two bombings took place on New Year's Eve 1983, with a bomb on a TGV fast train between Marseille and Paris that killed three people and wounded 13

nodes.description: 1983年新年前夜，马赛一个火车站发生爆炸，造成2人死亡。
nodes.support_text: and a bomb at a Marseille train station that killed two.

nodes.description: 1994年，他在苏丹被法国特种部队抓获。
nodes.support_text: The 62-year-old was captured by French special forces in Sudan in 1994.

nodes.description: 因新证据被发现，他因1982年和1983年的爆炸案而接受审判。
nodes.support_text: It was the discovery of fresh evidence that led to him being tried for the bomb attacks in Paris and Marseilles that also left more than 140 people injured.

nodes.description: 豺狼卡洛斯组织了四起发生在1980年代的致命袭击。
nodes.support_text: 豺狼卡洛斯组织了四起发生在1980年代的致命袭击。

nodes.description: 伊里奇·拉米雷斯·桑切斯（豺狼卡洛斯）将自己描述为一名职业革命家。
nodes.support_text: 伊里奇·拉米雷斯·桑切斯（豺狼卡洛斯）将自己描述为一名职业革命家。

nodes.description: 他策划了绑架人质事件。
nodes.support_text: 他策划了绑架人质事件。

nodes.description: 他因其策划的系列事件而获得了全球性的恶名。
nodes.support_text: 他因其策划的系列事件而获得了全球性的恶名。

nodes.description: 巴黎和马赛的炸弹袭击导致140多人受伤。
nodes.support_text: the bomb attacks in Paris and Marseilles that also left more than 140 people injured

nodes.description: 拉米雷斯在结案陈词中说他是一个'活着的档案'。
nodes.support_text: he said he was a 'living archive. Most of the people of my level are dead.'

nodes.description: 拉米雷斯朗读了一篇纪念前利比亚领导人卡扎菲的文本。
nodes.support_text: He read a text hailing former Libyan leader Muammar Gaddafi.

nodes.description: 前利比亚领导人卡扎菲资助了反西方袭击。
另外两次爆炸发生在1983年新年前夜。
nodes.support_text: The other two bombings took place on New Year's Eve 1983, with a bomb on a TGV fast train between Marseille and Paris that killed three people and wounded 13, and a bomb at a Marseille train station that killed two.

edges.support_text: Carlos, a Venezuelan whose real name is Ilich Ramirez Sanchez, is already serving life in a Paris prison for a triple murder in 1975.
node_1中的事件发生在1975年，而new_node_1中的事件发生在1980年代，因此前者在时间上早于后者。
It was followed a month later by the car bombing of an anti-Syrian newspaper in Paris.

The other two bombings took place on New Year's Eve 1983, with a bomb on a TGV fast train between Marseille and Paris that killed three people and wounded 13, and a bomb at a Marseille train station that killed two.
